campaign_id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign associated with the email data.

behavior_score_info.description: Information related to behavior scoring of email recipients.

indeterminate.description: Number of email recipients with indeterminate behavior.

send_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the email is scheduled to be sent.

status.description: The status of the email campaign (e.g., draft, scheduled, sent).

sending_is_imminent.description: Flag indicating if the email sending is imminent.

is_predictive_sending.description: Flag indicating if predictive sending is enabled for the email.

id.description: The unique identifier for the email data.

name.description: The name or title of the email campaign.

component_template_id.description: The unique identifier for the component template used in the email.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the email data was created.

updated_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the email data was last updated.

type.description: The type of email campaign (e.g., promotional, informational).

leads_count.description: The total count of leads targeted by the email campaign.
